alertDesc: Shows a modal dialog with a single confirm button.
alertMessage: This is an alert message from share/components/Alert.
confirmDesc: Shows a modal dialog with confirm and cancel buttons. Returns a boolean.
confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed?
promptDesc: Shows a modal dialog with a text input. Returns the entered string or null.
toastDesc: Shows non-blocking toast notifications at the top of the screen.
getThemeDesc: Retrieve the current Tinker theme and language setting.
setTitleDesc: Set the window title. Empty string resets to the plugin name.
showOpenDialogDesc: Open a native file picker, then reveal the selected file in the system file manager.
getClipboardFilePathsDesc: Read file paths currently copied to the system clipboard.
showContextMenuDesc: Show a native context menu at a given position.
execCommandDesc: Execute a shell command via Node.js child_process and display the output.
getSystemInfoDesc: Read OS platform, architecture, home directory and Node.js version via the os module.
